knimeNode.name: Size Appender
knimeNode.shortDescription: Appends sizes to one selected column.

intro.p: Appends an existing size model (SizeHandler) to one selected column of the input table.

This may be useful if the column for which the size model is defined gets lost somewhere in the workflow, is replaced by another column, or if there are two different datasets with the same class column.

fullDescription.option: Select the column to apply the size model to. It might be the same column, a different numeric column for which the size model should be reused, or a nominal column if the size model was defined for nominal values. Then the possible values must be exactly the same.

ports.dataIn: Table to which size settings should be applied to
ports.dataOut: Input table with size information applied to one column
